Title: Enter the Void
Writer: Michael Dante DiMartino (created by), Michael Dante DiMartino, Bryan Konietzko (created by)
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, Seychelle Gabriel, P.J. Byrne
Plot: Team Avatar hatches a plan to save the Airbenders, but all is not what it seems like. Zaheer rediscovers an old Airbender talent. The motive of the Red Lotus is finally revealed.
